trans-unit.source: The base exception class for the <see cref="N:System.Data.SqlTypes" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="N:System.Data.SqlTypes" /> 的基底例外狀況 (Exception) 類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlTypeException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlTypeException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlTypeException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlTypeException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解釋例外狀況原因的錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlTypeException" /> class with a specified error message.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的錯誤訊息，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlTypeException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The object that holds the serialized object data.
trans-unit.target: 存放序列物件資料的物件。

trans-unit.source: The contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: 關於來源或目的端的內容資訊。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlTypeException" /> class with serialized data.
trans-unit.target: 使用序列化資料，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlTypeException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream.
trans-unit.target: 進行還原序列化 (Deserialization) 期間會呼叫這個建構函式，以便重新構成經由資料流傳送的例外狀況物件。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [XML and SOAP Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-and-soap-serialization.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[XML 和 SOAP 序列化](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-and-soap-serialization.md)。

trans-unit.source: The message that describes the exception.
The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式的呼叫端必須確保這個字串已經被當地語系化 (為了目前系統的文化特性)。

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 做為目前例外狀況發生原因的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: If the <c>innerException</c> parameter is not <see langword="null" />, the current exception is raised in a <see langword="catch" /> block that handles the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>innerException</c> 參數不是 <see langword="null" />，則目前的例外狀況會在處理內部例外的 <see langword="catch" /> 區塊中引發。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlTypeException" /> class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的錯誤訊息以及造成此例外狀況的內部例外狀況的參考，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlTypeException" /> 類別的新執行個體。
